title: Log a Safety Incident
description: A driver reports a minor, non-injury accident. A safety manager must log the incident and begin the investigation process.

tasks.description: Receive a call from a driver reporting an incident.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers initial details: driver, location, and a brief description.

tasks.description: Create a new safety incident report in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new incident record is created with a unique ID.

tasks.description: Request photos of the damage from the driver and upload them to the incident report.
tasks.expected_outcome: Photos are successfully attached to the report.

tasks.description: Assign the incident to a claims adjuster for follow-up.
tasks.expected_outcome: The report is assigned to the correct person for investigation.
